summary: A test module that validates EC2 instance profile association operations using mocked AWS services. It includes helper utilities to quickly create EC2 instances and IAM instance profiles, and a series of test cases covering association, description, disassociation, replacement, and handling of invalid scenarios.
business_intent: To verify that EC2 instances can correctly manage IAM instance profiles—associating, replacing, and disassociating them—and that appropriate errors are raised for invalid operations, thereby supporting reliable infrastructure automation.
